劗字的基本解释

劗
zuān
同“剪”。

劗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuān］
［《廣韻》借官切，平桓，精。］
［《廣韻》在丸切，平桓，從。］
(1)剪；剃；剪除。
(2)通“攢”。簇聚。

劗字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　劗； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页145第42
【唐韻】在丸切【集韻】徂丸切，?音巑。【玉篇】鬀髮也。減也，切也。又【唐韻】借官切【集韻】祖官切，?音鑽。吳人謂髠髮爲劗。又【正韻】子踐切，音剪。【前漢·嚴助傳】劗髮文身之民也。【註】晉灼曰：淮南子云：越人劗髮。劗與翦同。又【讀書通】通作攅。【韓非子·用人篇】隨繩而?，因攅而縫。又通作鑽。【左思·魏都賦】鏤膚鑽髮。

劗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
劗字的起名意思

暂无。

劗
Basic explanation of words
劗
zuān
Same as "cut".
劗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuān］
["Guang Yun" borrowed from the official cut, flat Huan, fine. ]
["Guangyun" is cut in Maru, Pinghuan, from. ]
(1) Cut; shave; cut off.
(2) Through "save". Clustered.
劗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Knife word department] 　劗; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 145 42
[Tang Yun] Cut the pill [Ji Yun] Cut the pill, sound sing. 【Jade articles】Fa also. Cut it, cut it. Also [Tang Yun] cut by the official [Jiyun] cut by the ancestor,? Sound drill. The Wu people said that the hair is 劗. [Zheng Yun] Zi Jian cut, sound cut. [Previous Han · Yan Zhuan] People who have tattoos are also used. [Note] Jin Zhuo said: Huainan Ziyun: The more people use hair.劗 and 翦 are the same. Also 【Reading Master】Through the work. [Han Feizi·Employment] With the rope? Also pass as a drill. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] Cut skin and drill hair.
劗
